name: Ys I & II: Eternal Story
summary: Ys I & II: Eternal Story is an updated version of Ys I II Complete. It introduces an additional mode that re-balances the leveling system for a smoother transition between the two games. It also contains a bonus "Magic World", which contains new characters, a few sub-quests, as well as access to artwork gallery and sound test. Voice acting has been added as well.
